duties_responsibilities.duty: Compile and analyze account information for general ledger accountability and financial reporting.
Prepare balance sheet, profit and loss statement, and other financial reports to summarize the current financial status.
File state sales and use tax across multiple jurisdictions, including property taxes.
Assist with annual external audit by preparing assigned schedules and maintaining reconciliations of balance sheet accounts.
Direct other clerical accounting employees and perform similar job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or Accounting (CPA preferred)
